amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill by the Department of Energy for wind energy programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Whitfield amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 94 - 329 (Roll no. 339).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
